existing_features.title: Update the Radio Group control UI so each radio option button uses most of the available control space as a clickable target (not just the text area), while preserving existing selected/unselected styling and respecting Edit mode disabling.
Add a per-control configuration option for Radio Group controls to render options vertically or horizontally, and apply it in the Radio Group renderer.

Expose the Radio Group orientation setting in the control editing UIs (Inspector panel for an existing control, and Add Control modal when creating a radio control). Use English labels for the setting.
Ensure selecting a radio option emits an event that appears in the Recent Signals panel, including the control ID, control type, and a value that clearly represents the selected option.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make radio button options have a large clickable area (majority of their space is clickable)
Add configuration option to lay out radio button options vertically or horizontally
Log radio button selections to the Recent Signal Console when pressed

projectName: Improve radio group controls: larger clickable options, orientation setting, and selection logging
